thread.title: GOP Massachusetts Gov. Writes Letter Critical Of Republican Health Plan
thread.title_full: GOP Massachusetts Gov. Writes Letter Critical Of Republican Health Plan

author: Matt Shuham
title: GOP Massachusetts Gov. Writes Letter Critical Of Republican Health Plan

organizations.name: gop massachusetts gov. writes letter critical of republican health

text:
The Republican governor of Massachusetts has written a letter to the commonwealth’s all-Democratic congressional delegation critical of the Republican plan to replace Obamacare, and urging them to “ensure the people of Massachusetts continue to have access to quality health care.”
Read More →
